functions.tag: {display:{Name:"{\"text\":\"Blitz Scroll, Class 2\",\"color\":\"dark_green\",\"italic\":false}",Lore:['{"text":"Your willpower will keep you safe","color":"gray"}','{"text":"from the reapers, and so can their","color":"gray"}','{"text":"perverted will if you know how to","color":"gray"}','{"text":"use it right.","color":"gray"}','{"text":"--------","color":"gray"}','{"text":"+40% Movement Speed Per Nearby Foe","color":"gray"}','{"text":"Duration: 1s","color":"gray"}']},HoldingID:57,Unbreakable:1b,HideFlags:6,CustomModelData:9,AttributeModifiers:[{AttributeName:"generic.attack_speed",Name:"generic.attack_speed",Operation:0,Amount:1024,UUID:[I;396339519,1167964071,-2058290750,-779879336],Slot:"mainhand"}]}
